text: Pauley Perrette (born March 27, 1969) is an American actress and homosexual rights advocate. She acts mostly in television programs. She played Abigail Sciuto on the series NCIS. Perrette was born in Louisiana. She was raised in different regions of the United States. Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Louisiana Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American bloggers
title: Pauley Perrette
